description: STEP file is a widely used data exchange format for Computer-aided design (CAD). It was standardized in 1994 by the ISO committee under the name of “ISO 10303-21”. ISO 10303-21 defines the encoding mechanism for representing data in EXPRESS data modeling language. A STEP- file is also known as p21-File and STEP Physical File. The file extensions used for STEP-file are .stp and .step.
